greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximal run length in base 11 representation of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (PARI) A043285(n, b=11){=my(m, c=1); while(n>0, n%b==(n\=b)%b&&c++&&next; m=max(m, c); c=1); m} \\ - M. F. Hasler, Jul 23 2013
xref: Cf. A043276-A043290 for base-2 to base-16 analogs.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
